grouped.description: Grouped popup notifications are fetched with a single API request.

providerClassName.description: A provider class. Actual only if the `grouped` parameter is set to true. Should implement Espo\Tools\PopupNotification\Provider.

useWebSocket.description: If the WebSocked is configured and the parameter is set to true, notifications won't be polled in the front-end (except once, when page is loaded).

view.description: A frontend view for the popup notification.

interval.description: A polling interval in seconds. Actual if `grouped` is false.

url.description: An API endpoint used for polling. Actual if `grouped` is false.
